Treatment options for primary CNS lymphoma    Treatment options for primary CNS lymphoma in children may include:            -  Chemotherapy.               Treatment options for peripheral T-cell lymphoma    Treatment options for peripheral T-cell lymphoma in children may include:             -  Chemotherapy.
